attributes.action: Classify High Visibility clothing and accessories zero rated for VAT purposes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Protective Clothing is currently rated zero for VAT purposes in order to encourage people to purchase and remain safe.

High visibility clothing and accessories, such as bands, should be treated likewise.  These items are highly effective for people such as cyclists but are extremely expensive.  Additionally, if commuting cyclists felt safer on our very busy and dangerous roads, perhaps fewer would return to their cars over the winter months, as encouraged by other legislation.
